Recording.Name: Order promising with capable to promise on sales order

Node.Description: Open the Transport days form

Annotation.Title: Go to Inventory Management > Setup > Distribution > Transport days.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 16 (zero based index)

Annotation.Title: Observe that the transport lead time between the warehouse 13 and TX state is 3 days. Select this row.

Node.Description: Close the CustVendTransportPoint2Point form
Open the Released products form

Annotation.Title: Go to Product Information Management > Common > Released products.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 13 (zero based index)

Annotation.Title: In the Released products list, select Item Number D0004..

Node.Description: On the action pane, click Manage inventory

Annotation.Title: On the action pane, click Manage inventory.

Node.Description: Click Default order settings
Toggle the expansion of the Purchase order section
Toggle the expansion of the Sales order section
Close the InventItemOrderSetup form

Annotation.Description:
Observe the following fields in the Sales order section.
Override sales order lead time = No Sales lead time = 5 Override deliverable control = Yes Delivery date control = CTP
Annotation.Title: Follow the instructions the note for this step. Then close the Default order settings form.

Node.Description: On the action pane, click Manage inventory

Annotation.Title: On the action pane, click Manage inventory.

Node.Description: Click On-hand inventory
Click Display Dimensions
In the Warehouse field, enter 'True'
Click OK
In the grid, select row number 1 (zero based index)

Annotation.Description: Note that if you have inventory on-hand in your environment, you might have a different outcome with the calculated delivery date on the sales order.
Annotation.Title: Verify the physical inventory for Site = 1, Warehouse = 13, Configuration = Default is equal to 0. Select this row.

Node.Description: Close the InventOnhandItem form
Close the EcoResProductPerCompanyListPage form
Open the All sales orders form

Annotation.Title: Go to Accounts Receivable > Common > Sales orders > All sales orders.

Node.Description: Click New
In the field, open the lookup form

Annotation.Title: In the Customer account field, click the drop down button.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 10 (zero based index)
In the grid, click the row
Click OK
In the field, open the lookup form

Annotation.Title: In the Item number field, click the drop down button.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 13 (zero based index)
In the grid, click the row
Toggle the expansion of the Line details section
Click on the Delivery tab
In the Requested ship date field, enter '2015-03-17'

Annotation.Description: Observe that AX calculates the Requested ship date as the current day (i.e. whatever the day that you run this script) + 5 days (sales lead-time reviewed in the step 7 above) and the Requested receipt date as 3 days after the requested ship date (transport lead-time reviewed in the step 3 above).
Annotation.Title: Read the note for this step. Then set the Requested ship date to today.

Node.Description: In the Requested ship date field, enter '2015-03-17'
In the Requested receipt date field, enter '2015-03-20'

Annotation.Title: Set the Requested receipt date to 3 days after the Requested ship date.

Node.Description: Click Save
Click the Simulate delivery dates

Annotation.Description:
Depending on what time of the day you execute this script, you may or may not get the error message indicating that this ship date cannot be met.
If you did get the error message, and the "Available ship and receipt dates" form opened, then click Cancel on it, and try clicking this link again.
Annotation.Title: Click Simulate delivery dates.

Node.Description: Click Update confirmed ship date

Annotation.Description: Observe that AX issues an error message saying that the requested ship date cannot be promised and proposes the available ship dates based on capable to propose (CTP) calculation. AX calculates the earliest feasible ship date by performing an explosion of the D0004s bill of materials (BOM). CTP calculation applies a time-phased approach considering the products D0004 supply policy, projected available inventory, capacity constraints for the bill of materials and route definition as well as the D0004s components projected availability.
Annotation.Title: Read the note for this step and chose next earliest available ship date. Then click Update confirmed ship date.

Node.Description: Click Save

RootScope.Name: Order promising with capable to promise on sales order
